mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medical bag with instruments
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Bag contains a smaller leather case with 8 instruments. Another leather case holds 13 items including scalpels, hook, catheters, and scissors. In a maroon bag there is a metal box engraved Lilly Aseptic and holding a syringe and vials. Other instruments include a scale, obstetrical forceps, two specula, six additional scalpels, three forceps, a tuning fork, and an unidentified instrument.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--Bags
